name: SkeleTech
description:
Just a quick project made for my AR class. Scan an iPhone XR (or a picture of one, like the one below) and you'll get a 3D model made up of the phone individual parts. The parts are scalable, movable, and rotatable.

Here the GitHub if anyone's interested in the code: SkeleTech

Disclaimer: None of the 3D models or art assets were made by me. That means, unfortunately, I can't give permission to use the art assets.
